website_summaries.verdict: One can hardly find any negative comments for the Adidas Icon Bounce TPU baseball cleat. The pair has been dubbed by its users to be exceptionally comfortable, especially with its Bounce midsole. The price is also well worth what the shoe can offer.
pros: The Adidas Icon Bounce TPU baseball cleat has a comfortable fit according to the majority of its wearers
A couple of customers like the overall look of the pair
Raves about the shoes’ Bounce technology are prevalent across various review pages
One of the shoppers highly recommends this baseball shoe, especially with its price
This Adidas shoe has a great fit, say some customers
The pair belongs to a budget-friendly price range
Similar to the Adidas Icon 4 Trainer, this model makes use of a central lacing system
cons: A couple of reviewers experience durability issues with their pair
A customer says that the shoe is a tad too tight

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Molds
customer_reviews.text: I bought these cleats at the end of March for my 12 year old son who started spring baseball mid-April. By mid-May the molds at the top of the shoe were completely worn down, despite him putting and taking his cleats off in the dugout in order to prevent the molds from getting worn. Unfortunately, since I bought the cleats a month before baseball started, I am unable to return them. It was a complete waste of money! Cleats should last longer than 1 month.
customer_reviews.author: SBush

customer_reviews.title: Not very good performance
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is comfortable, but does not perform at a high level. This is because the mid-sole is actually too soft (compresses on push off), and because the cleat mold design allows dirt to clump on the bottom of the shoe, diminishing traction. Also, not super durable. Look somewhere else unless comfort is a higher priority than performance.
customer_reviews.author: MechKeyLover

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after 1 game.
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised at the durability of this product. Very poor quality. Son wore these 1 game and they are falling apart at the toe. These may not last 5 games...I would like a replacement or refund for these! Update: There were no spikes left after 25 games. Horrible product. Do not buy these...
customer_reviews.author: Jim74

customer_reviews.title: Great, Durable, Supportive Cleat - Nice Maroon Color
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe my 11yo son loves them. They are very durable and have a good grip pattern. They are lighter than they appear and provide some support for the ankles. Here in Texas we play on a variety of surfaces from weekend to weekend and they have performed well on Turf & Grass fields the same. The maroon is a true dark maroon, it is not the lighter maroon that some teams use.
customer_reviews.author: Sicem26

customer_reviews.title: Ran extremely narrow. Do not buy if you have wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes looked amazing. I was so excited when I opened the box, but was heart broken when i found out that they run extremely narrow. Unfortunately had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: James M

customer_reviews.title: Best alternate to metal I’ve found.
customer_reviews.text: Better than other molded cleats I’ve tried. These cleats seem to be harder which helps in average to soft ground conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Adidas quality, never lets down.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I've been wearing Adidas for years and sizes never change so it fits exactly as always if you know your size.
customer_reviews.author: Marccelo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing difference
customer_reviews.text: He went from being the fastest kid on the team to still being the fastest kid on the team. Batting average jumped over 200 points. Has to be the sneakers, and they look great!
customer_reviews.author: Chaleff

customer_reviews.title: Too small to fit
customer_reviews.text: These were too small but it was not the fault of the company but ours due to not ordering correctly! It can be hard to order without trying the shoes on. The company was very good about returning them without any hassle. Would recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! Color was just as expected, very happy to find one to match my sons uniform! He said they were really comfortable, and no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Pimping and lasting
customer_reviews.text: Love em. Great. Lasted all summer and will probably be many more. BTW I’m a pitcher whom drags his right toe. Cleats still held up. No holes. Remember college days when we had to buy rubber toe guards?? Not with these
customer_reviews.author: Shanon Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Good cleats for coaching your kids
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable on the field while practicing with my boys. Durability and traction are solid.
customer_reviews.author: G. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good molded cleat
customer_reviews.text: About as close to metal cleats as you can get. They are showing some wear after a month but are a good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Pickman

customer_reviews.title: Love shoe
customer_reviews.text: The recipient loves them. Strutted about the house with them on.
customer_reviews.author: IslandFaves

customer_reviews.title: Purchased these for my son for baseball.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my son for baseball. Great quality for a great price
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Nice cleat, runs small.
customer_reviews.text: Nice cleat but runs small. Had to return and go a full size up.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan A Schulte

customer_reviews.title: Cool Cleats
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these cleats. He wears them for baseball
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The cleats fit correctly
customer_reviews.text: These cleats have an internal elastic that keeps the fit snug against your foot. They are extremely comfortable. I flexed the sole with my hands for several minutes before I used them in a game. Otherwise they would have been too stiff too run in.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin C. George

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cleat
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fit they are as comfortable as my Adidas running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Hass23

customer_reviews.title: Great value for price!
customer_reviews.text: My 12yr old son puts these cleats through the rigors of baseball and outdoor field training. On a scale of 1-10 my son rates them a 9. We are happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brenton Rolle

customer_reviews.title: Adidas Cleats
customer_reviews.text: Cleats fit as expected. No complaints. My son has a difficult time finding cleats that he can wear that doesn't hurt his feet and so far after about 25 games, he has had no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Bostic

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: Tun much larger than expected. If you’re a 10.5 get a size 10.
customer_reviews.author: Angelita Torres

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but super narrow
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like very nice shoes, look really cool, just way too narrow - even 1.5 sizes up. I have 4E feet, not sure any size of this shoe would have fit.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Kevin Northup

customer_reviews.title: Best cleats for the price
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing that I don't like about these cleats. Since the first time I put them on they have been comfortable. I play ball sometimes 4 hours a night and feel never hurt
customer_reviews.author: Ray Ybarra

customer_reviews.title: Not true to their size
customer_reviews.text: This cleat does not even go over my 12 yr. old grandsons heal, it’s unfortunate that I paid all that money and can’t use them or return them. They are a great looking pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: ShawMarie Mulkern

customer_reviews.title: Size wrong
customer_reviews.text: Hi, The shows are beautiful, but I would like change the spikes because is men’s size and I need Women’s size. How can I do it? Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice cleat I have wide feet didn't work for me
customer_reviews.author: william schoengarth

customer_reviews.title: My son really likes the shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Fit well. Seem to be holding up well with the wear and tear of baseball. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Barry H.

customer_reviews.title: Fit was true!
customer_reviews.text: 1st game started out a little stiff, but by inning 4 and playing 3 games they were broken in! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie B.

customer_reviews.title: Great cleats
customer_reviews.text: What a great well made pair of cleats. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product. They fit true to size and are very comfortable. No need for inserts.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Waddy

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Look good. My son is happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Queen

customer_reviews.title: Praying for Baseball this year
customer_reviews.text: Has not had the opportunity to wear them yet. They look and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph  Irizarry

customer_reviews.title: A great baseball shoe with a great delivery process.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely no problems with this shoe or the transaction/delivery process. Perfect !!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hooker

customer_reviews.title: Love these cleats
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these cleats, how they feel and not to mention the killer look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Rubber cleat lasted just over a month. Light to moderate use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: adidas mens AQQ63 Icon Bounce Tpu
product_meta.description: Comfort, support, and durability on the diamond. Get it all from the adidas Icon Bounce Cleat that offers a premium nubuck upper for support, bounce midsole for responsive cushioning, and a new STEALTRAX TPU plate revolutionizes nonmetal traction performance and provides grip and dirt...
feature_bullets: Bounce cushioning provides enhanced comfort and flexibility
Nubuck upper with perforated vamp for breathability
Ironskin toe cap provides superior abrasion resistance in key toe-drag area
Padded tongue reduces lace pressure; Tongue wings for a locked-down midfoot fit
Molded Stealtrax TPU outsole plate is designed for baseball-specific movements and provides metal-like cleat performance and traction while playing any position on the field
